Text:
Oh. Thank you, thank you, thank you. dohduhdah, It feels like you are a king of knowledge ;)

Just what i need. I see that they have released a lot of new ttc-courses. Hope that they will come to PB eventually, especially the video-course of unexpected Economics and secrets of human perception.

By the way dohduhdah! Have you found any new math tutor courses yet? Electronics is my major and I truly need that and the hp50-calculator tutor too.. Any luck finding those?

Thank you for your contributions so far. I know that you have helped a lot of studying people, myself included. Too bad that as an european i have difficulties buying the math tutor courses, otherwise i had done that by now....

i would really like to express my impression & respect for your uploads :)
specially video learning material

@raenkae:
No new math tutor courses yet, sorry. But 'unexpected economics' and 'secrets of human perception' are in the pipeline and it looks like they will be available here within a matter of one or two weeks.
Thank you for your efforts dohduhdah. What would we do without you? ;)
